Posts.Content: On 2/9/2008 jacquie62 wrote: I finished chemo in January. My last 3 treatments was taxotere I am diabetic and am suffering terrible neuropathy in my legs and feet also swelling, my primary care Dr. said I was suffering more with this because of being diabetic and she prescribed "Lyrica" and it does help some. There are other things to help with neuropathy talk to your Dr. Good luck to you.........jp I too, received 3 rounds of Taxotere and suffer from terrible neuropathy in hands, fingers, feet & toes.  Onc. says this is rare, but I don't think so.  My last chemo was 8/07, and I still have the neuropathy.  How are you doing?
Posts.Title: numb feet

Posts.Content: Am 5 months out from 6 rounds of chemo and 30 rads during April-August of 2007. Triple negative. Was very very ill, but for now, doing ok.  Still have swelling from rads and neuropathy in hands & feet from Taxotere.  Just found out husband cheated on me while I was undergoing treatment..  Have heard this is sort of a common occurence.  Just wondering how to deal.  We have split up for now.
Posts.Title: husband problems anyone?
